## Authorization variable

Browser support for OAuth2. Automatically parses the URL query for an authorization code

Use of this plugin for anything other than the Webex Web Client is strongly discouraged and may be broken at any time   AuthorizationBrowserFirstParty 

**Signature:**

```typescript
Authorization: any
```
